languages.text: {n}Снаряд проходит меж светящихся глаз, с трудом пробивая испещренный чешуйками лоб. Черная и густая как деготь кровь медленно стекает по искаженному лицу.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Снаряд проходит меж светящихся глаз, с трудом пробивая испещренный чешуйками лоб. Черная и густая как деготь кровь медленно стекает по искаженному лицу.{/n}
traits.speaker: HaloDevice_Noble

languages.text: {n}The projectile strikes right between the creature's glowing eyes, barely piercing the scale-covered forehead. The blood, black and viscous like tar, slowly runs down the malformed face.{/n}

languages.text: {n}弾丸が生き物の輝く目の間に撃ちこまれ、鱗に覆われた額をわずかに傷つけた。黒く、タールのように粘土の高い血が、変形した顔をゆっくりとつたっていく。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The projectile strikes right between the creature's glowing eyes, barely piercing the scale-covered forehead. The blood, black and viscous like tar, slowly runs down the malformed face.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}弾丸が生き物の輝く目の間に撃ちこまれ、鱗に覆われた額をわずかに傷つけた。黒く、タールのように粘土の高い血が、変形した顔をゆっくりとつたっていく。{/n}
traits.speaker: HaloDevice_Noble

languages.text: {n}El proyectil impacta en el entrecejo de la criatura, atravesando a duras penas su escamosa frente. La sangre, negra y viscosa como la pez, recorre lentamente su deforme cara.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The projectile strikes right between the creature's glowing eyes, barely piercing the scale-covered forehead. The blood, black and viscous like tar, slowly runs down the malformed face.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El proyectil impacta en el entrecejo de la criatura, atravesando a duras penas su escamosa frente. La sangre, negra y viscosa como la pez, recorre lentamente su deforme cara.{/n}
traits.speaker: HaloDevice_Noble

languages.text: {n}她一枪正中怪物发光的两眼之间，打穿了它覆盖着鳞片的前额。一股如焦油般粘稠发黑的血浆从那张畸形的怪脸上缓缓流下。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The projectile strikes right between the creature's glowing eyes, barely piercing the scale-covered forehead. The blood, black and viscous like tar, slowly runs down the malformed face.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}她一枪正中怪物发光的两眼之间，打穿了它覆盖着鳞片的前额。一股如焦油般粘稠发黑的血浆从那张畸形的怪脸上缓缓流下。{/n}
traits.speaker: HaloDevice_Noble

languages.text: {n}Le projectile se fiche entre les yeux brillants de la créature, mais parvient à peine à fissurer son front écailleux. Un sang noir et visqueux comme du goudron s'écoule sur le visage déformé.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The projectile strikes right between the creature's glowing eyes, barely piercing the scale-covered forehead. The blood, black and viscous like tar, slowly runs down the malformed face.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Le projectile se fiche entre les yeux brillants de la créature, mais parvient à peine à fissurer son front écailleux. Un sang noir et visqueux comme du goudron s'écoule sur le visage déformé.{/n}
traits.speaker: HaloDevice_Noble

languages.text: {n}Das Projektil trifft genau zwischen die leuchtenden Augen der Kreatur und bohrt sich nur ein winziges Stück in die mit Schuppen besetzte Stirn. Das Blut, schwarz und dick wie Teer, läuft langsam das entstellte Gesicht hinab.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The projectile strikes right between the creature's glowing eyes, barely piercing the scale-covered forehead. The blood, black and viscous like tar, slowly runs down the malformed face.{/n}

traits.speaker: HaloDevice_Noble

languages.text: {n}Mermi, doğrudan yaratığın parlayan gözlerinin arasından vurup pullarla kaplı alnını delmekte zorlanıyor. Yaratığın kanı, biçimi bozulmuş yüzünde katran misali kara ve ağır bir şekilde yavaşça akıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The projectile strikes right between the creature's glowing eyes, barely piercing the scale-covered forehead. The blood, black and viscous like tar, slowly runs down the malformed face.{/n}
